faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about TravelNest

whatIs.question: What is TravelNest?
whatIs.answer: TravelNest is Sri Lanka's premier online marketplace connecting travelers with verified bus owners. Our platform makes it easy to search, compare, and book buses for group travel, weddings, corporate events, pilgrimages, and more.

howToBook.question: How do I book a bus?
howToBook.answer: Simply search for buses based on your travel dates and requirements, request quotations from multiple owners, compare prices and services, and book your preferred option with secure online payment.

payment.question: What payment methods are accepted?
payment.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and popular mobile payment options. All transactions are secured with industry-standard encryption.

cancellation.question: What is the cancellation policy?
cancellation.answer: Cancellation policies vary by bus owner. Generally, cancellations made 7+ days before the trip receive a full refund, 3-7 days receive 50%, and less than 3 days may not be eligible for refund.

verification.question: How are bus owners verified?
verification.answer: All bus owners undergo a thorough verification process including document verification, vehicle inspection, license validation, and background checks to ensure safety and reliability.

becomeOwner.question: How can I list my bus on TravelNest?
becomeOwner.answer: Register as a bus owner, complete the verification process by submitting required documents, add your vehicles with photos and details, and start receiving quotation requests from customers.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: TravelNest ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly, including name, email, phone number, payment information, and travel preferences. We also automatically collect usage data, device information, and location data when you use our services.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, process bookings and payments, communicate with you, ensure safety and security, and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We share your information with bus owners to facilitate bookings, payment processors for transactions, and service providers who assist our operations. We do not sell your personal information.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also object to processing or request data portability. Contact us to exercise these rights.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact us at privacy@travelnest.lk

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using TravelNest, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part, you may not access the service.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: TravelNest provides an online marketplace connecting travelers with bus owners. We facilitate the booking process but are not responsible for the actual transportation services provided by bus owners.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities under your account. You must provide accurate information and promptly update it.

booking.title: Booking and Payments
booking.content: Bookings are subject to availability and acceptance by bus owners. Payments are processed securely through our platform. Refunds are subject to the cancellation policy of each booking.

conduct.title: User Conduct
conduct.content: Users must not use the platform for illegal purposes, harass others, post false information, or interfere with platform operations. Violations may result in account termination.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: TravelNest is not liable for damages arising from the use of our platform or transportation services provided by bus owners. Our total liability is limited to fees paid to us.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these terms at any time. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance. We will notify users of significant changes via email or platform notice.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: This policy outlines the conditions under which refunds are provided for bookings made through TravelNest. Refund eligibility depends on the timing of cancellation and the specific bus owner's policy.

eligibility.title: Refund Eligibility
eligibility.content: Cancellations made 7 or more days before the trip: Full refund minus processing fees. 3-7 days before: 50% refund. Less than 3 days: Generally non-refundable unless otherwise specified.

process.title: Refund Process
process.content: To request a refund, cancel your booking through your account dashboard. Approved refunds are processed within 7-10 business days to the original payment method.

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.content: Full refunds are provided when: The bus owner cancels the booking, the vehicle provided differs significantly from the description, or there are safety concerns verified by our team.

disputes.title: Disputes
disputes.content: If you disagree with a refund decision, contact our support team within 14 days. We will review your case and make a fair determination based on available evidence.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For refund inquiries, contact support@travelnest.lk or call +94 11 234 5678
